entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's body is described as being in a tomb, with his spectacles still on his nose. His hands are folded over his chest, and the wand is clutched beneath them.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as someone who would not be scared to violate Dumbledore's tomb and take the wand for themselves.

relationships.description: The Dark Lord is described as someone who would violate Dumbledore's tomb and take the wand for themselves.

The Dark Lord is described as someone who would violate Dumbledore's tomb and take the wand for themselves. This relationship is bidirectional, so we also have a 'violator' relationship from Dumbledore to the Dark Lord.
Dumbledore's body is described as having the wand clutched beneath his hands, indicating that he was the owner of the wand.
The Dark Lord is described as someone who would take the wand for themselves, indicating that they desire to possess it.
